channel.title: SOCIAL GRAPHS BLOG
channel.description: Recent content on SOCIAL GRAPHS BLOG

item.title: Blair Waldorf
item.description: Here you can take a look at Blair waldorf or “Queen B”. Blair has an ongoing up and down relationship with Chuck Bass, and after Serena van der Woodsen and Dan Humphrey. To take a closer look at the relations, we have made a graph and a wordcloud that visualizes them.

item.title: Chuck Bass
item.description: Here you can take a look at Chuck Bass. Throughout the television series, Chuck has an on-again/off-again relationship with Blair Waldorf. They marry in the series finale. To take a closer look at the relations, we have made a graph and a wordcloud that visualizes them.

item.title: Dan Humphrey
item.description: Here you can take a look at Dan Humphrey or “Lonley Boy”. Dan has an on-again-off-again relationship with Serena van der Woodsen and the two have the longest running relationship on the show. Dan and Serena finally get married in the finale. Dan is good friends with Nate Archibald, Blair Waldorf, and Chuck Bass. To take a closer look at the relations, we have made a graph and a wordcloud that visualizes them.

item.title: Eric Van Der Woodsen
item.description: Here you can take a look at Eric Van Der Woodsen. Eric is the brother of Serena van der Woodsen and son of Lily and William van der Woodsen. To take a closer look at the relations, we have made a graph and a wordcloud that visualizes them.

item.title: Jenny Humphrey
item.description: Here you can take a look at Jenny Humphrey. She is the younger sister of Dan Humphrey and a social climber who idolizes Blair Waldorf and Serena van der Woodsen. To take a closer look at the relations, we have made a graph and a wordcloud that visualizes them.

item.title: Lily Van Der Woodsen
item.description: Here you can take a look at Lily Van Der Woodsen. Lily is the mother to Serena and Eric van der Woodsen, as well as being the birth mother of Scott Rosson and the adoptive mother to Chuck Bass. To take a closer look at the relations, we have made a graph and a wordcloud that visualizes them.

item.title: Nate Archibald
item.description: Here you can take a look at Nate Archibald. Nate is best friends with Chuck Bass and is good friends with Dan Humphrey, Serena van der Woodsen and Blair Waldorf. To take a closer look at the relations, we have made a graph and a wordcloud that visualizes them.

item.title: Rufus Humphrey
item.description: Here you can take a look at Rufus Humphrey. Rufus is the father of Dan and Jenny Humphrey, and the ex-husband of Alison Humphrey and Lily van der Woodsen. To take a closer look at the relations, we have made a graph and a wordcloud that visualizes them.

item.title: Serena Van Der Woodsen
item.description: Here you can take a look at Serena Van Der Woodsen, or New Yorks It-girl. Serena has an on-again, off-again relationship with Dan Humphrey and the two have the longest running relationship on the show. She is best friends with Blair Waldorf and shares close friendships with Nate Archibald and Chuck Bass. To take a closer look at the relations, we have made a graph and a wordcloud that visualizes them.
